channel.title: Image processing on Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Image processing on Portfolio

item.title: Image processing
item.description: In this two-person project, we created different filters for edge finding, denoising and filtering, like : - Gaussian filter - Median filter - Adaptative filters (like bilateral filter) We used the Laplacian of Gaussian filter to detect edges. We compared the different performances, accuracy and algorithm speed of each technique, presenting advantages and disadvantages of using them.
